label: Threshold Trigger
category: '[Sandia]/Timing Utilities'

parameters:
-   id: hi
    label: Threshold High
    dtype: float
-   id: low
    label: Threshold Low
    dtype: float
-   id: length
    label: Length Threshold
    dtype: int

inputs:
-   label: mag
    domain: stream
    dtype: float
-   domain: message
    id: disarm
    optional: true

outputs:
-   domain: message
    id: trig
    optional: true

templates:
    imports: import timing_utils
    make: timing_utils.thresh_trigger_f(${hi}, ${low}, ${length})
    callbacks:
    - set_hi(${hi})
    - set_lo(${low})
    - set_len(${length})
